src:
Ovo Error Masih Berlanjut Hari Ini
06 Nov 2019, 12:12 by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Foto: Rachmatunnisa/detikINET

Jakarta - Banyak orang mengeluhkan layanan pembayaran digital Ovo yang tidak bisa digunakan kemarin. Tapi, masalah masih berlanjut hari ini.Pantauan detikcom di lini masa, Rabu (6/11/2019) rupanya masih banyak pengguna Ovo yang masih kesulitan melakukan transaksi hari ini. Mereka mengeluhkan masalah error yang sampai berlarut-larut.









Pihak Ovo pun merespons keluhan user. Mereka masih mendata apa yang sedang terjadi.



detikcom pun berusaha menghubungi pihak Ovo. Mereka masih melakukan pengecekan dan akan memberikan jawaban resmi. Sebelumnya untuk kejadian eror kemarin, Head of PR OVO Sinta Setyaningsih, mengatakan terjadi gangguan pada aplikasi akibat ada gangguan pada jaringan sebagian pengguna Ovo. Apakah masalah yang sama berulang hari ini?Simak Video "Rudiantara Semringah Sambut OVO Jadi Unicorn Kelima Indonesia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fay/fay)
text:
Ovo Error Continues Today
Nov 6 2019, 12:12 p.m. by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Photo: Rachmatunnisa / detikINET

Jakarta - Many people have complained about Ovo's digital payment service that could not be used yesterday. But, the problem still continues today. AFP monitoring on the timeline, Wednesday (11/06/2019) apparently there are still many Ovo users who are still having trouble doing transactions today. They complain about the problem of protracted errors.









Ovo also responded to user complaints. They are still listing what is happening.



AFP also tried to contact the Ovo. They are still checking and will give an official answer. Earlier for yesterday's error, OVO's Head of PR Sinta Setyaningsih said that there was a disruption in the application due to a disruption in the network of some Ovo users. Is the same problem repeated today? Listen to the video "Rudiantara Semringah Welcomes OVO to Become the Fifth Unicorn of Indonesia" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (fay / fay)
